title: Chicago Mayor’s $3.8 Billion Debt Proposal Reduced Amid Pushback
description: Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson’s proposal to sell $3.8 billion in bonds was reduced Tuesday by $1 billion after facing opposition from a key member of the city council finance committee as the deadline to pass a 2026 budget nears.
content: Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson’s proposal to sell $3.8 billion in bonds was reduced Tuesday by $1 billion after facing opposition from a key member of the city council finance committee as the deadline to pass a 2026 budget nears.
